Message.Title: Who's the schnorrer?
Message.Msg: 203.690994 ? Seriously? Who trades off by 6 milltionths of a dollar? If that person were buying all 1,435,925 shares traded so far today, that little shaving would amount to $8.62 saved on a $292 million transaction. Seriously. Someone identify this idiot. I want to sell him a bay.

Topic.Title: Detecting a pattern on the IBM message board

Message.Msg: Can you list the trolls for me to put in "ignore" as well? I am a (lucky) long time investor and visit the board from time to time, but not often enough to figure out who the regular trolls are, although the BS in general is more than apparent. Email me if you don't want to do this publicly.
